Made for the Moments
Experience Olde Eight on Lake Greenwood
Sign up to for our Newsletter to receive news and updates as Olde Eight continues to take shape.
Follow The Journey
Experience Olde Eight
Become A Member
Live Here
CRAFTED & INTENTIONAL
The most powerful words in English are, ‘Tell me a story.’
– Pat Conroy –
The Lifestyle
Jump In
Olde Eight is a place to fully experience life. From cutting-edge golf and wellness facilities to chef-driven dining, a charming General Store and a spectacular lake club and beach with private marina on Lake Greenwood, this is a community designed for effortless enjoyment, all year long.
The Game
Stride Ahead
With a Drew Rogers-designed 18-hole course, a lighted short course, a Piedmont Putting Course and a dynamic practice facility featuring climate-controlled hitting bays and an indoor putting studio, Olde Eight is built for players who love the game—and the moments that come with it.
The Community
Unwind
All homes are designed and built by Lanthorne Homes, our trusted residential partner. With timeless architectural character and a seamless process grounded in care, clarity and connection, Lanthorne will help you bring your Olde Eight vision to life.
An Experience That’s
Casually Refined
Cuisine
With four unique dining experiences on property, you and your guests can enjoy a quick snack, slow down over a casual lunch or celebrate something special with us.
The Repair Shop
Under the guidance of our world-renowned teaching professional, Shane LeBaron, our Golf Academy is top of class.
The Hanger
Not your average golf shop. Our classic Airstream will have many functions and lives. It currently serves as our mobile golf shop.
The Lake Club
Take in lake views during a pickleball match, laps in the Olympic-sized pool or while you sip on a cold one over a casual lunch.
Member's Lounge
Warm up in the golf simulators or gather post-round in elevated, relaxed community spaces.
Golf Cabins
Members can take advantage of luxuriously appointed cabins for hosting friends or booking staycations.
The Courses
Between our championship 18 roaming through the property’s wooded or lakeside areas and the lighted eight-hole short course, your competitive spirit can thrive at Olde Eight.
A Path to Connect It All
Intentionally designed trails let you unwind and recharge while connecting with nature.
Red's General Store
Grab sundries and the mail. You’ll probably run into a friend, or three, while you’re here.
Get In Touch
For real estate inquiries, corporate bookings, club membership information, rates and partnerships, please fill out the provided form.
Download Master Plan
– Made for the Moments –
Olde Eight
709 Swing About | Greenwood, South Carolina 29649
